title.full: Prince of Persia The Forgotten Sands
title.reduced: Prince of Persia The Forgotten Sands

description.full: Walk the path of a young warrior caught between the forces of Good and Evil. Defy a dark god and heal an ancient Persian kingdom of a deadly dark plague to save the world.
description.short: Walk the path of a young warrior caught between the forces of Good and Evil. Defy a dark god and heal an ancient Persian kingdom of a deadly dark plague to save the world.
